response.overview: A dynamic and easy to understand presentation by Mike Riddle that examines; Attempts to create life in labs The building blocks if life: an insurmountable problem for evolution Probability and the origin of life The second law of thermodynamics Information and complexity Bonus Material Interviews with John Morris - Ph.D & President of ICR, Andy McIntosh - Ph.D, Darryl White - US Federal Judge retired & Frank Sherwin - M.A. Scenic video of God's creeation
response.tagline: Scientific Evidence that Demands a Creator God
response.title: The Origin of Life
